# Elves
Elves are a race very similar to humans, but have no common ancestors. They can be found in any corner of Sileitha, but most often living near forests or reserves.
## Ancient Magic
Elves magic reserves are [color=#1e90ff]2.5x as big[/color] however they have [color=#ffa500]NO natural regeneration of magic.[/color]
Elves only way to regenerate magic is by using a spell unique to them Mana Trance.
Also, elves initially have basic and advanced metamagic.
